definitions.definition: The rounded seed - bearing capsule of a cotton or flax plant .
A protuberance or excrescence growing on the trunks of some trees, a burl .
An old dry measure equal to six bushels .

main_definition: The rounded seed - bearing capsule of a cotton or flax plant .
secondary_definitions: A protuberance or excrescence growing on the trunks of some trees, a burl .
( Scotland ) An old dry measure equal to six bushels .
